text: Carla Fracci OMRI OMCA (; 20 August 1936 – 27 May 2021) was an Italian ballet dancer and actress. Fracci became one of the most experienced and well known dancer of Romantic ballets. Her best known performances were in Nijinsky, Giselle (American Ballet Theatre), and Complete Bell Telephone Hour Performances: Erik Bruhn 1961–1967. She was best known for her performances in Giselle. Fracci died in her hometown Milan on 27 May 2021, at the age of 84 from cancer. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian stage actors Category:Ballerinas Category:Italian dancers Category:Actors from Milan Category:Italian movie actors
title: Carla Fracci
